alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 8:40PM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Difficult driving for high profile vehicles along I-8 through the San Diego County Mountains. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur on the ridges and desert mountain slopes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
